title: Real-Time Gesture and Continuous Authentication System for Software Defined Vehicles
subtitle: Multimodal Biometric Security for Next-Gen Automotive Systems
description: A comprehensive security and interaction framework for Software Defined Vehicles (SDVs) integrating facial recognition, gesture-based controls, and voice command interfaces for continuous driver authentication and hands-free operation.
detailedDescription: This project presents a security architecture for SDVs that continuously validates driver identity using multimodal biometrics, preventing unauthorized access at any stage. The system includes a MySQL-driven OTP module for temporary access, detailed access logs, and automatic alerts for suspicious activity. Implemented in Python with OpenCV, Face Recognition, and Speech Recognition, the prototype demonstrates practical security and usability for intelligent transportation systems.

beginner.summary: Imagine a car that knows who you are and keeps you safe by recognizing your face, gestures, and voice. This project brings that to life for next-generation vehicles.
realWorldApplications: Preventing car theft with continuous driver authentication
Temporary access for family or friends via OTP

intermediate.methodology: The system fuses facial, gesture, and voice biometrics for robust authentication. OTP-based access control is managed via MySQL, and all access is logged for auditability. Alerts and protective actions are triggered automatically.
intermediate.technicalApproach: OpenCV and Face Recognition libraries process video streams for facial and gesture recognition. Speech Recognition enables voice commands. The backend manages OTPs and logs, while the SDV interface controls vehicle functions.

advanced.implementation: Prototype implemented in Python, integrating OpenCV for video, Face Recognition for biometrics, and Speech Recognition for voice. MySQL manages OTPs and logs. The system is modular for future integration with real vehicle controls.
researchContributions: First multimodal continuous authentication for SDVs
Integration of gesture, face, and voice in one system
